title: The Archmage's Gilded Sacrifice
flavor_text: The excess of mortal currency has thinned the veil between worlds, causing a spiritual rot in the value of our coin. To prevent a total economic collapse and appease the Weaver of Fate, the Grand Archivist demands a massive offering of gold to stabilize the realm's magical resonance.
objective: Donate 5,000,000 Gold to the Sacred Crucible in the Capital City to reach the global server goal.
reward: Exclusive Title: 'Architect of Prosperity' and the 'Aurelian Wing' limited-edition wings cosmetic.
